# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  **GitHub:** [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  
**Location:** New York, New York

---

## Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with experience in AWS architectures and machine learning, driving impactful software solutions.

---

## Core Skills
- **Programming:** Python, SQL, Java, .NET  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, SageMaker), Azure  
- **Data:** ETL/ELT, Data Modeling, NoSQL  
- **AI:** Generative AI, Machine Learning, Statistical Analysis  
- **DevOps:** CI/CD, Docker, Agile/Scrum  

---

## Experience

### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**  | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  | Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed secure, scalable AWS architectures for enterprise clients.  
- Automated sentiment-analysis pipeline for 1M+ records, achieving 5x faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies**  | Remote, NY  | Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Developed API integrations, enhancing system functionality and performance.  
- Configured Azure environments, streamlining application deployment processes.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  | New York, NY  | Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows, reducing manual workload significantly.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access, enhancing service quality.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)**  | Remote, NY  | Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, achieving a 96% graduation rate.  
- Developed testing materials to assess student progress effectively.  

---

## Projects

### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Built FastAPI + OpenAI GPT-4 system, reducing application time by 60%.  
- Integrated job-board APIs, boosting weekly applications by 300%.  

---

- GPA: 4.0  | Dean’s List 2x

City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  | Jun 2024
